name: Weizhe Jao
personality: Resourceful and meticulous, Shan Fu is always looking for the most efficient ways to complete his missions. He is a disciplined soldier, and his strict adherence to orders often puts him at odds with his more independent-minded squadmates.
story: Shan Fu grew up in the city of Chongqing, where he was raised by his grandparents after his parents died in a car accident when he was only six years old. He joined the Chinese army as soon as he turned 18, and has since risen steadily through the ranks thanks to his hard work and dedication. Shan Fu excels at handling missile systems, and is one of the most respected missile specialists in his unit. He has served on several overseas deployments, including a stint in Syria, and has earned a reputation as a reliable and effective soldier. Despite his successes, Shan Fu has always felt a sense of loneliness and isolation, and often finds himself yearning for a deeper sense of purpose in life.
